message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.SY, cs.CV

The paper proposes a new active learning algorithm for solving sequential decision prediction problems, which is a common problem in machine learning and artificial intelligence. The algorithm uses loss gradients to selectively query an expert, which is a technique commonly used in deep learning and optimization (cs.LG). The paper also discusses the use of the algorithm in imitation learning settings, which is a subfield of machine learning and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The algorithm is designed to mitigate the problem of covariate shift, which is a common problem in robotics and control systems (cs.RO). The paper also discusses the use of the algorithm in image-based environments, which is a common application of computer vision (cs.CV). Finally, the paper discusses the use of the algorithm in safety-aware settings, which is a common concern in control systems and robotics (cs.SY).
